description:
Michelle takes a very long break from her latest art installation to go and snatch the cutest petite female skateboardist from the playground down the block.

Still wet behind the ears, Amber is led blindfolded inside Michelle’s loft space, and with enthusiasm she very quickly transforms Amber into her latest “art piece,” turning her into her sex toy.

Hardcore Girl/Girl BDSM! Kinky Freaky and Hot, including bondage, breast and pussy punishment, anal, strap-on dildo penetration and deep throat, oral, kissing, spanking, whipping, masturbation, and a variety of kinky sex toys; just a few of the lessons Amber will be taught today. Not to mention the “piece de resistance” – Skateboard Sex!
title: Skateboard Kink Freak
